summary: A test suite that checks the ToTensord transform correctly converts various input formats—including NumPy arrays, optional CuPy arrays, PyTorch tensors, and scalar values—into torch tensors, covering both single and batched cases and handling device placement.
business_intent: Validate the reliability of the data conversion step in medical imaging pipelines, ensuring that inputs of different types and locations are consistently transformed into tensors suitable for downstream deep learning models.
